google_play_reviews.content: Exceptional navigation aid!
Great app. üëç easy to use and great support from Dev Team.
Excellent Aviation App. I've tried most of them out there, & in my opinion, this is by far the best.
Excellent! Just EXCELLENT.
Just getting started... but for a free app
Great flight ap. Free. Use it frequently
Very usfull

This used to be a good aviation app, but now it requires all kinds of permissions that make no sense in ADM aircraft, plus they want your email address. The app doesn't do anything unless you grant it all the access it wants.
I use it for it's simplicity
Easy to use!
Its a very good aviation gps map
Fantastic App for Android phones and tablets.

My "go to" Android app with moving map for 10+ years. Always free and a great primary or backup for your maps, GPS, flight planning, airport info, etc. I keep on my tablet and phone. For some reason, Avare has figured out how to make the GPS location work better than my others apps on Android. Thank you, Avare!

I have been trying other aviation applications and all have different features and benefits, but Avare so far seems to be most user friendly, and has what a VFR sport pilot needs. I have shared this with other student pilot's to explore to see if it fits their needs. Thanks for developing this application.
Does what I want it to do.
Easy for me to use for VFR recreational flying.
Except for getting it to connect to msfs2020 it is great
It's the best!

Easy to use and compatible with level aviation with safety function such as the angle of attack indicator and the 3d Display with synthetic vision that makes it as competitive as a million dollar avionics package
This app is absolutely perfect for navigating with aviation
Great app. PFD is not working (I liked this function). ADSB input in IO tab coming from from NESDR (through Avare ADSB Pro) is no longer working. Worked in the past.
Excellent , easy to navigate , most everything a basic pilot would need .
I think this app is great and has been very well put together thank you!!! I use it all the time:)
Great app!
Great source of info for my flying.
It is a useful app but not a complete world map. Many Asian countries are missing üò¢ üòï
Does everything I want it to do. I built a stratux and it integrates seamlessly to give ADSB in.
Simple, works fine even on older / cheaper devices.
I love the app
excellent
Easy to use great price
A very functional app

As a young pilot, I experienced a generator failure in the early morning darkness hours southwest of Denver. Thankfully, I was able to steer away from the mountains by flashlight and return to JBC for a safe landing. Now that I have Avare on cell phones and a tablet, my navigation is thoroughly backed up.
Best free app out there
A great cheap app!!
Sometimes it jumps around on the map
A little clunky but awesome
IFR moving map for free! Awesome

I use this as a backup for for flight. It allows a completely independent system to be available for IFR flight in addition it can be used as a second display to just show the plates on one display and maps and everything else on another. It allows one to do this with a very inexpensive Android based system. In addition there is no obvious cost to it. Perhaps they have started to ask for donations and I will gladly provide them.
Love this simple alternative to Foreflight, works great on my Samsung tabs.
It's an amazing tool to have in your arsenal. I used it in one of my cross countries that I planned and it worked phenomenally.

It took a little bit of a learning curve to figure Avare out, but once you get the flow of how it works, this is an AWESOME app. There are videos on YouTube to help new users get up and running. There are a few things I would like to see added, like fuel prices, but its really a GREAT app.

I've been flying for 30 plus years and have watched paper pubs for replaced with digital, NDBs and VORs get replaced with GPS. This program is the best aviation planning and enroute software on the market, hands down. I use an android phone and tablet and both operate this program well.
Easy interface love it
Does everything ForeFloght does once you figure it out, but documentation could be much better.
Best there is
Has been very good for short travel
Best flight EFB in my opinion. Free of charge with great features.

Great flying app for Android! This app has some great features that are very useful, no matter if you are planning your trip or are already en route. Avare has many features that other apps charge extra for, such as geo-referenced approach plates or ADHRS information. This is a great free aviation app! I highly recommend this to all my pilot friends who love their Android devices. I did most of my instrument training with this app and continue to use it for VFR flying. Cannot recommend enough!
Great app I use it for my flight Sims perfect it's perfect for me
Great program and it's free, but donating is a good thing!
Very helpful and basically free. Donations appreciated but not required.
Always reliable, fast opening and fairly easy to navigate. Works great as a backup chart/GPS combo
üëçüëç
Great features. Easy to use.
Great app that does it all just have to do the tutorials
Amazing easy to use app.and free
This app is great
Professional product and on time updates. Provides great opportunities and makes navigating so easy! I greatly appreciate the ability to connect ASDB info, a HUGE safety measure!
great and getting better all of the time now 2023 and still great
Great free basic navigation app
Brilliant. Everything I need.
Fantastic app,have used it for many, many years
Works for me in every plane and jet that i fly.
I have used Avare for many long cross country VFR flights. It works excellent!
Fantastic been using it for years

This app is nothing short of amazing!!!! And it keeps getting better. I am a pilot who really wants the thank the developers of this app. This is the first review I have ever wrote of an app. Yeah, it's that Good
Excellent app that's easy to use. And it's free.
Love it
I have used Avare for several years and am glad to have it be a part of my flight bag.
I have used Avare for years and have found it to be super useful in my VFR ops.
I use this app all the time especially on cross country trips.
It really quite good, does almost everything I would want.
Exceptional aviation app, none better
Great app for all my VFR flying needs. It interfaces flawlessly with my Statux for ads-b in. I am extremely satisfied.
Works great is consistent and user friendly. Thank you for the great app!!
Been using it for years as a commercial pilot and CFI it's has been outstanding. Thank you
Can't beat it for the price! Love how it connects with ADSB. Use it every flight. My primary means of navigation.
Exactly what I've been looking for as an FAA Certified sUAS Remote Pilot.
Excellent choice for a cost conscious aviator
Perfect for my needs.
Great app use it daily
Best deal on the internet, it does everything I would ask out of for flight, but it's free
Good database
Excellent value, works very well, good adsb display. Only improvement could be a graphical flight plan optimized for winds at altitude. Highly recommended.
Love it
Awesome, I like the way the instrument approach plates show your position in the plate. Great for situational awareness.
It's a very good, free, aviation map app, great for the VFR pilot. It has a few buttons that are difficult to decipher, but it's generally easy to use.
Easy to use and has all the basic features
Powerful tool
Love it!
I have used this app for the last 8 years works great, links up with our lynx ngt 9000
excellent program. simple to use. a must have for anyone who does a lot of flying.
I really like the app,works great for me.
Excellent resource!
It just keeps getting better. If I could get the ads-b in info it would be perfect. I love it so much I'm going to donate to them! Otherwise it's free!
While not my primary EFB, it's a great backup!

In my experience it is a very good app for android once you learn how to use it. I have had it in my phone for months now without using it because the UI wasn't exactly intuitive at first but now that I took some time to ise it I find it to be very helpful. 5 stars.
Like having winds aloft easily accessible!
For basically free, this app is as best as it can get. I have been using it since my instrument rating and still use it as a flight instructor. Good Job guys!!
Great
